title: Inkfinder
description: Magical and alchemical tattoos for Pathfinder Second Edition of all levels.

curse.label: Curse
curse.description: This equipment transfers or bestows a curse.

consumable.label: Consumable
consumable.description: This tattoo is destroyed after activation.

twinned.label: Twinned
twinned.description: A twinned tattoo only works if two tattoos are Crafted on two willing targets at the same time. The price in a twinned tattooâ€™s stat block reflects the price of both tattoos, and they require only a single Crafting check and the same amount of downtime as a single tattoo. These tattoos refer to the other tattoo wearer as a twinned partner. The frequency of activating a twinned tattoo might specify once per day per twinned partner (such that each partner activate their tattoo once per day) or once per day for the twinned pair (such that the pair tattoos can be activated only once per day). Twinned partners must always be willing for a twinned tattoo to be activated.

prediction.label: Prediction
prediction.description: This equipment grants you a prediction of the future.

olfactory.label: Olfactory
olfactory.description: This equipment produces its effects via odors.

linguistic.label: Linguistic
linguistic.description: This equipment's effects rely on sharing a language.
